entry.source: 〉 A vast, white space spreads as far{F801}as you can see...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A vast, white space spreads as far{F801}as you can see...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Jonathan is nowhere to be seen...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Jonathan is nowhere to be seen...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Walter is nowhere to be seen...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Walter is nowhere to be seen...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}White shadow\0{F87A,77}{F813,0,190002}Upon receiving knowledge and wisdom,{F801}the atom that learned desire has{F801}opened the gate once more.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}White shadow\0{F87A,77}{F813,0,190002}Upon receiving knowledge and wisdom,{F801}the atom that learned desire has{F801}opened the gate once more.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}White shadow\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,190003}We ask the mitochondria within you...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}White shadow\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,190003}We ask the mitochondria within you...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}White shadow\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,190004}Have you ever given thought to why{F801}humans are born? Why the world exists?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}White shadow\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,190004}Have you ever given thought to why{F801}humans are born? Why the world exists?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}White shadow\0{F87A,78}{F813,0,190006}A single atom's revolt will damage{F801}no more than a single cell...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,190007}The damaged cell will quickly be{F801}healed by the other cells.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}White shadow\0{F87A,78}{F813,0,190006}A single atom's revolt will damage{F801}no more than a single cell...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,190007}The damaged cell will quickly be{F801}healed by the other cells.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}White shadow\0{F87A,75}{F813,0,190008}In order to sever this chain, there{F801}is a decision yet to be made.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}White shadow\0{F87A,75}{F813,0,190008}In order to sever this chain, there{F801}is a decision yet to be made.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}White shadow\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,190009}We shall show you the guideposts for{F801}that decision.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}White shadow\0{F87A,1}{F813,0,190009}We shall show you the guideposts for{F801}that decision.{F801}
